meanings.definition: A person who is passionate about cinema.
meanings.sent1: Cinephiles enjoy watching movies at the theater.
meanings.sent2: Many cinephiles have a vast collection of films at home.
meanings.sent3: The cinephiles organized a movie marathon that lasted all weekend.
meanings.sent4: To cinephiles, each film is like a treasure waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The group of cinephiles discussed their favorite directors with great enthusiasm.

meanings.definition: Those who have a deep love for movies.
meanings.sent1: My friends are true cinephiles; they watch a movie every night.
meanings.sent2: Cinephiles appreciate the artistry and storytelling in films.
meanings.sent3: The cinephiles' movie nights always include popcorn and lively discussions.
meanings.sent4: For cinephiles, a movie is not just entertainment but a form of art.
meanings.sent5: The cinephiles eagerly awaited the release of the new blockbuster.
